item.description:
Farmington River Tubing will put you and your friends in our specially designed river tubes for a 2.5 mile ride down the wild and scenic Farmington River.

Traveling over three sets of rapids, you'll experience a thrill as you splash through the white water.

All participants must meet restrictions (Warnings/Rules).

Cost: CASH ONLY, no credit cards or personal checks accepted.
$20/person - includes the rental of a specially designed river tube, life jacket, shuttle bus ride from the take-out point to the starting. Additional tube ride on same day - $10.00.

Deposit required for rental: car keys* preferred (so you don't lose them in the river) or drivers license. *Must be able to hang on our numbered hooks. Remember the number you are given to check back in and retrieve your deposit.

After our river trip well enjoy a late lunch in the shaded picnic area. Please bring lunch item to share with the group - post what you'll be bringing in your RSVP. I will supply all paper goods and an array of beverages.

Carpool suggested - please contact members directly or post in comments.

Bathing suite, sunscreen, bug spray, towel, and change of clothes suggested.

When you arrive, purchase your ticket and we'll wait for all to arrive. By 12:20ish well head out on the river. Please call if your running late 508-415-0590.

This event is for Funseekers members only, and would appreciate that the above not be re-posted on another Meetup groups site. Thanks!
item.how_to_find_us: By tube rental area in parking lot
item.name: River Tubing!
